title: Label, "M&Co: Cheers from M&Co Mini-Sticker Set", 1984–85
dimensions:
1993-151-396a, Laboratory Technician - 5.1 x 3.5 cm (2 x 1 1/2 in.)
1993-151-396b, Musicians - 3.8 x 5.1 cm (1 1/2 x 2 in.)
creditline: Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.
description:
Black and white photographs, washed in pale green and imprinted Cheers from M&Co in white capitals across the bottom, comprise the design format.

1993-151-396a, Laboratory Technician - An above-the-waist view of a smiling man, dressed in a lab coat, dress shirt and tie, and holding a beaker, is placed against a background of labeled bottles arranged on shelves.

1993-151-396b, Musicians - On the lower right, a smiling man, head turned toward  
his fellow musician, also smiling, is seen in profile on the lower left ; judging from their posture, these two appear to be percussionists or keyboard players. They are joined by a third, identified as such by his hands in the upper left hand corner playing a wind instrument, which slants down diagonally toward the center. A rope, slanted top to bottom, appears behind the instrument and the second musician's head.

tombstone.epitaph:
Label, "M&Co: Cheers from M&Co Mini-Sticker Set", 1984–85.
1984–85. Offset lithography. Gift of Tibor Kalman/ M & co.. 1993-151-396-1,2.
